config.sql: SELECT B.SCODE as id,SUM(NVL(FACT_A,0)) AS BQ,SUM(NVL(FACT_B,0)) AS BNLJ, SUM(NVL(FACT_C,0)) AS BNMB,SUM(NVL(SNTQ,0)) AS SNTQ, CASE WHEN SUM(NVL(FACT_C,0))=0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(NVL(FACT_B,0))/SUM(NVL(FACT_C,0))*100 END WCL FROM( SELECT DIM_ITEMPERIOD , SUM(NVL(FACT_A,0)) AS FACT_A,SUM(NVL(FACT_B,0)) AS FACT_B,SUM(NVL(FACT_C,0)) AS FACT_C,0 AS SNTQ FROM DW_FACTFINANCEPERIOD WHERE DIM_COMPANY IN(SELECT SCODE FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE CTYPE='1' AND CISDEL='N' START WITH SCODE=:company CONNECT BY PRIOR SCODE=SPCODE) AND DIM_PERIOD=:comparePeriod AND DIM_ITEMPERIOD IN('1416001','1403100') GROUP BY DIM_PERIOD,DIM_ITEMPERIOD UNION ALL SELECT DIM_ITEMPERIOD ,0 AS FACT_A,0 AS FACT_B,0 AS FACT_C, SUM(NVL(FACT_B,0)) AS SNTQ FROM DW_FACTFINANCEPERIOD WHERE DIM_COMPANY IN(SELECT SCODE FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE CTYPE='1' AND CISDEL='N' START WITH SCODE=:company CONNECT BY PRIOR SCODE=SPCODE) AND DIM_PERIOD=:period AND DIM_ITEMPERIOD IN('1416001','1403100') GROUP BY DIM_PERIOD,DIM_ITEMPERIOD) A INNER JOIN DW_DIMITEMPERIOD B ON B.SCODE = A.DIM_ITEMPERIOD GROUP BY B.SCODE,B.SNAME
